channel.title: xBox Red Ring
channel.description: I have red ring on my new xBox that I have barley used. Microsoft are such asses. :(

item.title: xBox Red Ring
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:34, topic:392336”]I have the Xbox Pro and I’ve gotten the red rings of death once, and after that I didn’t feel like obtaining it again, and Microsoft told me that it should never obtain it again, and so far, I haven’t.

The red rings of death is a hardware problem, and the reason it’s had that kind of problem is because of Microsoft wanting to release the Xbox on time, and didn’t want to postpone it. If I remember, the hardware problem still continues in Xbox Slim, however, the Slim has a shutdown method automatically so it doesn’t obtain some sort of damage.[/quote]

Bill gates can suck my left nut.

Read full topic

item.title: xBox Red Ring
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I have the Xbox Pro and I’ve gotten the red rings of death once, and after that I didn’t feel like obtaining it again, and Microsoft told me that it should never obtain it again, and so far, I haven’t.

The red rings of death is a hardware problem, and the reason it’s had that kind of problem is because of Microsoft wanting to release the Xbox on time, and didn’t want to postpone it. If I remember, the hardware problem still continues in Xbox Slim, however, the Slim has a shutdown method automatically so it doesn’t obtain some sort of damage.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

[quote=“cane, post:21, topic:392336”][quote author=Mack n cheese link=topic=489508.msg3579049#msg3579049 date=1303659987]

unplug it completely and wrap it in a towel/blanket.

Your supposed to keep it plugged in…
[/quote]i got red ring 3 years ago and did what i said and haven’t had a problem with it since

That was from rubbing your prostate…[/quote]

You want a green ring, it means nothing is wrong.[/quote]he was joking coony <3

item.title: xBox Red Ring
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Acrodox:

I have the green ring, it sucks.

You want a green ring, it means nothing is wrong.

@TOPIC - I had RRD (is it still called that?) twice, but a simple unplug, let it sit for 30 minutes. Plugged it back in, and it worked fine. (Was twice in same day, a week after I bought it, had it nearly a year now)

Read full topic

item.title: xBox Red Ring
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

If you aren’t under warranty just look up some fixes and try what m.dog said. Otherwise if nothing else is working just trade it in for some cash or something.

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:12, topic:392336”][quote author=Pzezima2 link=topic=489508.msg3578811#msg3578811 date=1303642021]
I was going to buy a new computer, now I think I have to buy a xbox slim.
[/quote]

Slim looks way better, and is totally better. One of my buttons fucked up on it but i ain’t sending it to be repaired because knowing microsoft, it will take them a week. (It was my fault anyway)[/quote]
I really don’t see what makes the Slim so much better than the Elite, but it’s all personal opinion anyway.

Read full topic
